snippet: Speculation has been rampant that a gambling center would be set up in Willets Point, but the Bloomberg administration says it is not going to happen.
abstract: Crumbling industrial area near Citi Field in Queens has been viewed as likely location for casino resort, if New York State legalizes full-scale gambling; Bloomberg administration insists  there will never be a casino in that area, where it hopes instead to develop new housing, shopping and entertainment venues.
lead_paragraph: Speculation has been rampant that a gambling center would be set up in Willets Point, but the Bloomberg administration says it is not going to happen.

headline.seo: No Chance for Casino in Willets Point, Queens, City Says
headline.main: City Dismisses Talk of a Willets Point Casino
headline.print_headline: City Dismisses Talk of a Willets Point Casino
